House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03026
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CALLING FOR A CONSTITUTIONAL CONVENTION OF 2016
SHORT TITLE : Constitutional Convention Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Calls for a Constitutional Convention which shall be composed of elected one (1) each from the eighty (80) provinces and from the thirty three (33) highly urbanized cities of the country plus forty (40) delegates to be appointed by the President from various sectors of society.
